attributes.action: Investigate mankinds true impact on the environment due to CO2 emissions and adjust policies accordingly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To date there has been no proven link between mankinds C02 emissions and global warming. In fact, the planets greatest C02 producer is the oceans, and rotting leaves. Many leading scientists refute claims that mankind has had any impact on the environment with regards to C02 and that no matter what we do as a species, we will not be able to slow the heating of the planet due to natural rhythm.  It seems irresponsible of the worlds governments to base taxation etc, on issues with little or no grounding.  It seems about time we were told the truth, and not just kept on the bandwagon for the sake of it.

Research Topic: 'Great Global Warming Swindle'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
